sn35.102:4.2: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.102:4.6: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.102:4.9: Te vo pahīnā hitāya sukhāya bhavissanti.
sn35.102:4.12: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.102:4.15: So vo pahīno hitāya sukhāya bhavissati … pe …
sn35.102:4.16: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi na tumhākaṃ.
sn35.102:4.18: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissati.
sn35.102:4.19: Yampi, bhikkhave, na tumhākaṃ, taṃ pajahatha.
sn35.102:4.20: Taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”ti.
